Articles.Content:
The rules are simple: You rate the above user on a scale of 0 to 10 after how familiar he or she is to you, where 0/10 is completely unknown and 10/10 is a Kerbal celebrity.

Let the games begin!

EDIT: Hmm, maybe you should also include some kind of short comment, just so people don't write filler-text all the time.

Edited September 13, 2012 by Felsmak

0 :3

I need more than 10 characters ;3

1

[filling of goodness]
Seen you on the forums and you posted allot but apart from that do i not see you as a celeb 3/10

5

utter udder

6

[ignore this section]
0 because I have never seen you before.

1

you highlighted this, sucker

5

I've seen you quite often
2 I've seen you before, but only like 3 times.

Ooo im posting again!! ;3

^^^ 8

I remember your avatar easily.

4-5 I've seen you quite often in the forums. (Or atleast your avatar, I'm so terrible with names)

EDIT: I miss the old forum's anti-ninja function

0

Because you have no avatar, I wouldn't recognize you if I ever saw you before.
2. Sometimes I have seen you I think.

10^^^

I know your vincent ;3.

I dont know, for some reason ever since i started the forums, i just kept stalki-. I mean i kept seeing you around.

Im posting on here too much ;3
5 Dont know ya but I do, Confusing right???
3 - I've seen you some times before, but there is no "personal entry about you in my mind" to say it in a metaphorical way.
1, Not payback But Honestly I've never seen you around, Are you active alot.

3

Your avatar is familiar, but I haven't seen it in a long time. It might be a MIRAGE

10^^^

I know your vincent ;3.

I dont know, for some reason ever since i started the forums, i just kept stalki-. I mean i kept seeing you around.

Im posting on here too much ;3

Your first sentence ended with a ;3 and then a period. The last ended with a ;3 but no period. Also, you need to capitalize the single "I"s.

Edited September 13, 2012 by SNapple
I forgot to put a reason last time I edited

3

Your avatar is familiar, but I haven't seen it in a long time. It might be a MIRAGE

All i know is that hes a 12 year old who loves space.

And for you my friend! 2. I remember that you sigged that comment in a thread. not sure which.

5

This is the most active thread that has ever been.

Oh, and you can click on the button after the name on the quote in my sig to see the actual post in it's natural habitat.

2, I remember your name (not sure if that's because it's a drink?)

This game seems quite narcissistic.

I like it!

7

You are a moderator, but I don't see you that often.
10, I flew to a moon base with you.

9.75,

Yeah, I remember those days. 0.14 seems like almost an eternity ago, though.
